summary: A ring that regenerates your Health, Magicka, Stamina + 10 Resists Damage
descriptionHtml:
a ring that regenerates your magicka, stamina and most 
important your health while your in heavy battles with heavy hostiles.
this is not totally powerful but it helps a lot.
for better regen, run/hide then return in battle.

if you have an issue when you exit and resume your game the ring doesn\'t
activates its ability, the solution: unequipped and then equipped the ring.

you can only forge at skyforge in whiterun or via console: 
player.additem \"a deathless ring\" 0

Copy the esp and paste to your data folder or use NMM to install.
author: kullashaker
